detaileddescription.para: < Motor control task priority UART and sensor info task priority

briefdescription.para: UART handler for READY state commands.

detaileddescription.para: Parses incoming text commands such as START_OPER, RESTART, HELP, and routes to appropriate actions or state transitions.

briefdescription.para: UART handler to configure sensor info delay.

detaileddescription.para: Converts ASCII data to integer and updates delay for sensor info timer.

briefdescription.para: UART handler to set control mode.

detaileddescription.para: Parses TORQUE, SPEED, or POSITION strings and logs selected mode. Then returns to ready state.

briefdescription.para: UART handler for OPERATIONAL state control packets.

detaileddescription.para: Parses numeric packets for torque commands or special commands (stop, ready, info, reset), with safety checks on encoder limits.

briefdescription.para: Handles UART input to verify button test result.

detaileddescription.para: Parses user input string to determine whether the button works. Logs result, updates test status, and advances test sequence.

briefdescription.para: Handles UART input to verify linear encoder test result.

detaileddescription.para: Parses user input string to determine whether the linear encoder works. Logs result, updates test status, and advances test sequence.

briefdescription.para: Handles UART input to verify angular encoder test result.

detaileddescription.para: Parses user input string to determine whether the angular encoder works. Logs result, updates test status, and finishes test sequence.

briefdescription.para: Timer callback to trigger sensor info task.

detaileddescription.para: Gives the info_please_sem semaphore to schedule data reporting.

briefdescription.para: Sends TWAI message and verifies response ID.

simplesect.para: true if response ID matches, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sends TWAI message without ID check.

simplesect.para: true if any response received, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Logs TWAI message content.
Discovers motor CAN ID by scanning range.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t d0, uint8_t d1, uint8_t d2, uint8_t d3, uint8_t d4, uint8_t d5, uint8_t d6, uint8_t d7)
memberdef.name: motor_request

briefdescription.para: Sends motor command over CAN and waits for optional reply.

detaileddescription.para: Constructs a CAN frame with the provided data bytes and transmits it. If DEBUG is disabled, waits for a confirmation response via twai_request().

parameterdescription.para: Data bytes to include in the frame. (0-7)

simplesect.para: true if transmission (and optional reply) succeeded, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t d0, uint8_t d1, uint8_t d2, uint8_t d3, uint8_t d4, uint8_t d5, uint8_t d6, uint8_t d7)
memberdef.name: motor_request_wo_reply

briefdescription.para: Sends motor command over CAN without waiting for a reply.

detaileddescription.para: Constructs and transmits a CAN frame with the provided data bytes, then ignores any response.

parameterdescription.para: Data bytes to include in the frame. (0-7)

briefdescription.para: Issues immediate stop command to motor.

detaileddescription.para: Sends two sequential stop frames to ensure motor halts.

briefdescription.para: Triggers a system reset command on the motor.

detaileddescription.para: Sends reset frame and delays for 1 second to allow reboot.

briefdescription.para: Requests telemetry information from the motor.

detaileddescription.para: Sends info request frame to retrieve voltage, temperature, and error codes.

briefdescription.para: Commands motor to enter shutdown state.
Applies signed torque command to the motor.
Sets motor target velocity.

detaileddescription.para: Multiplies velocity by 100 (unit scaling) and sends command frame.

briefdescription.para: Checks if motor responds to info request.

simplesect.para: true if motor acknowledges, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: FreeRTOS task for motor control operations.

detaileddescription.para: Performs a system reset and info request on the motor, then enters a loop waiting for torque commands via the move_sem semaphore.

briefdescription.para: Initializes motor by centering encoder and establishing zero position.

detaileddescription.para: Applies torque in opposite directions and waits for user confirmation via btn_sem. Monitors encoder_position to detect center; enforces timeout of 3 seconds. Signals completion through init_done_sem if first initialization.

briefdescription.para: FreeRTOS safety monitor task for motor encoder limits.

detaileddescription.para: Waits for initial motor setup completion, then continuously checks the encoder_position against SAFE_REGION boundaries. If out-of-bounds, logs danger, reinitializes the motor, and restores safe state.

briefdescription.para: Configures UART parameters and installs driver.

detaileddescription.para: Sets UART baud rate, data bits, parity, stop bits, and flow control, then configures TX/RX pins and installs the UART driver with buffer.

briefdescription.para: FreeRTOS task for UART event processing.

detaileddescription.para: Continuously reads bytes from UART into a buffer and invokes the current state handler function pointer with the received data.

briefdescription.para: Switches UART handler to operational state.

detaileddescription.para: Creates and starts a periodic timer to trigger sensor info reporting.

briefdescription.para: Switches UART handler to ready state.

detaileddescription.para: Stops and deletes the sensor info reporting timer if active.

briefdescription.para: FreeRTOS task to publish sensor information.

detaileddescription.para: Waits on info_please_sem, computes linear and angular velocities, and prints position, velocities, and angle if safe.

briefdescription.para: Interrupt Service Routine for linear encoder channel.

detaileddescription.para: Called on any edge of the linear encoder's first channel. Compares states of both encoder channels to determine movement direction and increments or decrements the linear encoder position counter.

briefdescription.para: Interrupt Service Routine for angular encoder channel B.

detaileddescription.para: Called on the rising edge of angular encoder channel B. Updates the angular position by a fixed step size depending on the state of channel A to determine direction.

briefdescription.para: Interrupt Service Routine for angular encoder zero marker.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the zero position marker is detected on channel C. Resets the angular encoder position to zero for calibration.

briefdescription.para: Interrupt Service Routine for button press.

detaileddescription.para: If initialization is active, gives semaphore from ISR context to signal that the button was pressed.

briefdescription.para: Initialize GPIO pins and configure interrupts.

detaileddescription.para: Configures all required GPIOs for the linear and angular encoders and the user button. Sets pin modes, pull-downs, and interrupt types. Installs ISR service and attaches handlers to GPIO pins.

briefdescription.para: Configure CPU power management settings.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the minimum and maximum CPU clock frequencies to maximum value, and disables light sleep to ensure full performance during operation.

briefdescription.para: Runs a full sensor and button test sequence.

detaileddescription.para: Runs in a separate FreeRTOS task. Guides the user through manual tests for the button, linear encoder, and angular encoder. Waits for user confirmation via UART after each step and logs results. Loops endlessly.

briefdescription.para: Main entry point for the application.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes CPU, GPIO, UART, CAN bus, tasks, and semaphores. Starts all system tasks and waits for completion. After tasks finish, cleans up all resources and restarts the device.

briefdescription.para: Main application entry point and firmware for CartPole controller.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes CPU power management, GPIOs, UART, and CAN interfaces. Creates FreeRTOS tasks for motor control, safety monitoring, UART command handling, sensor data reporting, and hardware tests.
